summary: A U.S. agent goes undercover as a rich playboy to stop a madman from destroying a NASA moon project.
cast: Anthony Eisley|Wandisa Guida|Diana Lorys|Luisa Rivelli|Francisco Sanz|José María Caffarel|Renato Montalbano|Oreste Palella|Folco Lulli|Barta Barri|Tito García|Luciana Petri|Clemente Ukmar|Goffredo Unger|Nino Vingelli|Arnaldo Dell'Acqua|Fernando Hilbeck|Mario Lanfranchi|Renzo Pevarello|Manlio Salvatori
keywords: rocket launching|malfunction|rocket explosion|self destruct|voice over narration
title: Operación Goldman
